channel.title: Posts on Alek Timm's Sports Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Alek Timm's Sports Blog

item.title: Drive for dough? How the PGA TOUR's best make their money
item.description: Professional golf is undergoing a revolution in the way the game is played. Stronger players and significant advances in driver technology have led to a driving distance boom. Spearheaded by the likes of Tiger Woods, John Daly, Rory McIlroy, Bryson Dechambeau, and numerous other bombers, PGA TOUR professionals are ditching the classic golf adage “drive for show, putt for dough.” Professional golfers are terrific putters; however, it’s the driver that makes the money for the best in the world.

item.title: PGA TOUR pros drive for the dough
